scripts.publish:project: npm run build:production; ./node_modules/.bin/bump patch; npm publish
scripts.update:dev: npm run update:packages && npm run update:symlinks && npm run update:dependencies
scripts.update:packages: npm i; npm i netistrar-whitelabel@latest oxil-net1@latest
scripts.update:symlinks: npm link ../net1; npm link ../../netistrar/whitelabel; npm link ../../kinicart/kinicart-js; npm link ../../kinicart/kiniauth-js; npm link ../../kinibind
scripts.update:dependencies: cd node_modules/netistrar-whitelabel; npm run update:packages; npm run update:symlinks;  cd ../oxil-net1; npm run update:dev;
